name: Jaleebi Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Jaleebi Recipe: All Purpose Flour ½ kg Sugar 1 kg Orange Food Color 1 pinch Yeast 1 tbsp Saffron few flakes Screw Pine Essence few drops Milk as required Silver Leaves as required Oil as required
instructions: For sugar syrup: Take a cooking pan add water and add 1 kg of sugar mix it well add few drops of screw pine essence mix it well now sugar syrup is ready. For sugar syrup: Take a ½ tsp of sugar and 1 tbsp of yeast mix it well and leave it for 15 minutes when the yeast is raised add ½ kg of all purpose flours, 1 pinch of yellow food colour few drops of saffron and add as required milk make a mixture and leave it for 2 hours and when the mixture is ready beat it. Take a cooking pan heat the oil now take a mixture in a piping bag and round and round fry take it out in serving platter. dip into sugar syrup and garnish with silver leave and serve it.
